,Bartter syndrome
What are the treatments for Bartter syndrome ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of Bartter syndrome:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Bartter syndrome antenatal type 1  - Genetic Testing Registry: Bartter syndrome antenatal type 2  - Genetic Testing Registry: Bartter syndrome type 3  - Genetic Testing Registry: Bartter syndrome type 4  - Genetic Testing Registry: Bartter syndrome, type 4b  - Genetic Testing Registry: Bartter's syndrome   These resources from Med
